This movie got released in 2010. If you remember the political landscape of India at that time, you would understand the nature of the plot. Corruption and political aspirations are the two points this movie revolves around. 

With actors like Amitabh and Paresh Rawal, the acting couldn't be an issue but other actors were flawless as well, and there were many of them. Ritesh Deshmukh played a good and important role.

Though some of the things shown in the movie were not practical and were overdramatized, it was, however, a good watch.

I basically won't provide feedback but this movie was remarkable. Excellent performance by everyone. Sir Amitabh Bachan created another milestone. But what makes me really stunned was Mohnish behl act. He was amazing in his character. Hat's off Mohnish Sir.

Now a days this is the real scenario of Politics in India. if one has to know the real situation behind  motive of a political party then one should have gone through the entire situation. if India have to build strong enough then every single man have to understand the situation in their own thought, not by the respective political parties, cause most of the work for their own interest. last of all regards to RamGopal ji !!
